verses.t: LordThe {H3068} hear{H6030} thee in the day{H3117} of trouble{H6869}; the name{H8034} of the God{H430} of Jacob{H3290} defend{H7682} thee;defend…: Heb. set thee on an high place
Send{H7971} thee help{H5828} from the sanctuary{H6944}, and strengthen{H5582} thee out of Zion{H6726};thee help: Heb. thy helpstrengthen: Heb. support
Remember{H2142} all thy offerings{H4503}, and accept{H1878} thy burnt sacrifice{H5930}; Selah{H5542}.accept: Heb. turn to ashes: or, make fat
Grant{H5414} thee according to thine own heart{H3824}, and fulfil{H4390} all thy counsel{H6098}.
We will rejoice{H7442} in thy salvation{H3444}, and in the name{H8034} of our God{H430} we will set up our banners{H1713}: Lordthe {H3068} fulfil{H4390} all thy petitions{H4862}.

Now know{H3045} LordI that the {H3068} saveth{H3467} his anointed{H4899}; he will hear{H6030} him from his holy{H6944} heaven{H8064} with the saving{H3468} strength{H1369} of his right hand{H3225}.his holy…: Heb. the heaven of his holinesswith…: Heb. by the strength of the salvation of
Some trust in chariots{H7393}, and some in horses{H5483}: but we will remember{H2142} the name{H8034} Lordof the {H3068} our God{H430}.
They are brought down{H3766} and fallen{H5307}: but we are risen{H6965}, and stand upright{H5749}.
Save{H3467}, Lord: let the king{H4428} hear{H6030} us when{H3117} we call{H7121}.
